info.name: Tumblr - Enjoy the dark side
info.description:
A full dark theme for your entire Tumblr.
Turn off the lights with this theme and enjoy the brand new minimal interface that makes all look better.
FEATURES:
  • centered dashboard;
  • no recommended blogs and radar;
  • no annoying ads;
  • posts are much more readable;
  • minimal layout that ensures minimal eyestrain;
  • awesome dark activity page;
  • restyled buttons;
  • XKit support.
info.additionalInfo:
AUTHOR: PASSIVELOVE CHECK OUT NO MORE TUMBLR PLAYERS! The first Chrome Extension to block all the players in any Tumblr blog! WARNING: I'M NOT WORKING AT THIS THEME ANYMORE, SO THERE WILL NOT BE FURTHER UPDATES! === Changelog =============================== VERSION 3.2.2 - 06/05/2015
  • Styled liked posts suggestions.
VERSION 3.2.1 - 02/05/2015
  • Fixed "new post" button, live notifications and post text headers color.
  • Removed new recommended blogs in dashboard.
  • Removed new sponsored posts.
VERSION 3.2 - 04/04/2015
  • Updated accordingly to the new Tumblr Layout update.
  • Centered dashboard, no right column.
  • Updated screenshots
VERSION 3.1.2 - 09/03/2015
  • Fixed posts' sources background color.
VERSION 3.1.1 - 08/02/2015
  • Added XKit post buttons (and loading) support.
  • Fixed tumblr crushes style on following page.
VERSION 3.1 - 07/02/2015
  • Removed Tumblr Dashboard advertisements.
VERSION 3.0.3 - 28/01/2015
  • New post create/edit/reblog style updated.
VERSION 3.0.2 - 23/01/2015
  • Tumblelog popover fixed.
  • Post avatar arrow fixed in inbox.
  • Post avatar arrow scrolling fixed.
VERSION 3.0.1 - 09/01/2015
  • Post avatar arrow fix.
VERSION 3.0 - 09/12/2014
  • New redesigned dashboard style.
  • Theme optimizations for new Tumblr style.
  • Added full support to all the pages (jobs, business, docs, dev...).
  • New screenshots for preview.
VERSION 2.3.4 - 24/10/2014
  • Fixed search bar background color.
  • Styled /search root page with dark background.
VERSION 2.3.3 - 05/09/2014
  • Following and Spotlight page fix.
VERSION 2.3.2 - 19/08/2014
  • Fixed problem with main left column color.
  • Right column, activity page, inbox, following (etc.) pages' background fixed.
VERSION 2.3.1 - 18/07/2014
  • New sideblogs on activity page update styled.
VERSION 2.3 - 18/07/2014
  • Fixed issue with the new version of the tumblr dashboard.
  • Search pages and doc pages fixed.
  • Restyled some buttons and some other stuff.
VERSION 2.2.1 - 05/06/2014
  • Fixed issue with sprite images (buttons etc).
  • Minor bug fixes.
VERSION 2.2 - 07/05/2014
  • Updated to match new tumblr style changes.
  • Added support to the new user interface and dashboard header.
VERSION 2.1.1 - 18/02/2014
  • Fixed the Documentation Page.
VERSION 2.1 - 06/02/2014
  • Restyled round-border buttons.
  • Dynamic restyled control menu.
  • Fixed bug that made sideblogs inaccesible.
VERSION 2.0.1 - 05/02/2014
  • Added https/ssl support.
VERSION 2.0 - 02/02/2014
  • COMPLETELY REDESIGNED USER INTERFACE!
  • Changed name to "Tumblr - Enjoy the dark side".
  • New Activity page design.
  • New following/followers pages design.
  • Any page of Tumblr is supported.
  • Compatibility improvements.
  • Round-border buttons.
  • ... and more!
VERSION 1.7.2 - 18/12/2013
  • Fixed the color of the new permalink button on dashboard posts.
VERSION 1.7.1 - 25/11/2013
  • Fixed a bug with the control menu on the right top corner of blogs.
  • Removed the gray new post icons option.
VERSION 1.7 - 24/11/2013
  • Added the Firefox support for all the properties of the theme.
  • Redesigned dashboard CSSs for Firefox.
  • Added new supported pages to the theme.
VERSION 1.6.5 - 23/11/2013
  • New post icons updated.
VERSION 1.6.4 - 08/11/2013
  • Updated style of reblogged answers.
VERSION 1.6.3 - 07/11/2013
  • Changed color of link posts background from green to grey.
VERSION 1.6.2 - 06/11/2013
  • Updated to fix new Tumblr posts wrapper background color.
VERSION 1.6.1 - 18/10/2013
  • Resized the control menu to contain the new "customize" option.
VERSION 1.6 - 18/10/2013
  • Adapted the stile to the new Tumblr Dashboard design.
  • Fixed the color of the search bar.
  • New dashboard notifications stile.
VERSION 1.5 - 30/08/2013
  • Changed the color of the options, photo reply and social buttons.
  • Fixed a bug that didn't allow user to select the post action from the new post menu.
  • Minor graphic fixes.
VERSION 1.4 - 21/08/2013
  • Modified the reblog/like/share buttons color, they were updated by tumblr to a black version that was uncompatible with this style, now they are grey and more visible.
VERSION 1.3 - 11/08/2013
  • Fixed the sidebar menu aspect.
  • Modified Queue page colors and adapted to the black and white.
  • Removed small links on the sidebar menu.
  • Deleted the plexi-glass aspect (that caused problems) on new post pages.
VERSION 1.2 - 10/08/2013
  • Added the option to select the color of the New post Icons. You can select it from the settings right on top of this page near the photo ^^^.
  • Fixed colored buttons on Activity page.
  • Added a more dark background on notes of Activity page when the cursor is going through them.
VERSION 1.1 - 10/08/3013
  • Fixed the "loading more posts" bar color, now is grey.
  • Fixed the notification icons, their border is now black.
  • Added StyleSheets to the "settings" page.
  • Fixed the color of text in chat and text boxes.
VERSION 1.0 - 09/08/2013
  • FIRST VERSION: Created Dark Passion.
